text: usane ek udaaharan diya hai svayan tumhaaraah kya tumhaare[1] daason mein se tumhaara koee saajhee hai usamen, jo jeevika pradaan kee hai hamane tumhen, to tum usamen usake baraabar ho, unase darate ho jaise apanon se darate ho? isee prakaar, ham varnan karate hain aayaton ka, un logon ke lie, jo samajh rakhate hain
